detailsData.title: Team Support
detailsData.content: A Supportive Team on Your Side, ensuring personalized and attentive service for every client.

detailsData.title: No Fees Unless
detailsData.content: You Do Not Pay Unless We Win Your Case, aligning our success with yours.

detailsData.title: Experience
detailsData.content: Over 85 Years of Combined Legal Experience, bringing a wealth of knowledge to your case.

detailsData.title: Millions Recovered
detailsData.content: Tens of Millions of Dollars Recovered for Our Clients, demonstrating our ability to achieve substantial results.

address: 51 East Campbell Avenue Suite 120 Campbell, CA 95008
valueProp: Caputo and Van Der Walde - Injury & Accident Attorneys is known and recognized as a leader in personal injury litigation due to our uncompromising commitment to your legal rights. With over 85 years of collective experience, our attorneys have a reputation for providing high-quality legal services and delivering excellent results. We have resolved hundreds of cases through settlements, verdicts, and awards.

testimonalData.text: Caputo and Van Der Walde (and their entire team) are a class act Law firm. Everyone I spoke with was professional, patient, and extremely accountable.
testimonalData.author: Karen B

testimonalData.text: Paul has a great understanding of people's rights and drives to obtain all that is due to you. He listens and answers questions that anyone could understand.
testimonalData.author: Gary G.

testimonalData.text: Don Peeler is the man! I got in an accident where I was rear ended and shoved into two cars in front of me. Highly recommend!
testimonalData.author: Pete G.
